text: @Alyssafarah @PressSec @washingtonpost The “supply” of those who can be TESTED is the ENTIRE POPULATION of the State. Trump needs to tell the Governors to get off their butts and TEST EVERYBODY!  Give them a STICKER to put on their shirt, “I’VE BEEN TESTED!” Let’s find out how many really have COVID19!
